requestParams.name: query_can_init
requestParams.desc: 查询可以设置期初库存的仓库列表，该参数为true时，分页参数不生效

requestParams.name: query_group
requestParams.desc: 是否为门店场景要查询总部仓库信息，query_can_init,warehouse_ids时该参数不生效

requestParams.name: query_type
requestParams.desc:
查询类型，
1:只查询基础信息（不包含仓库名称，地址）单次插询数量无限制
2:查询仓库名称地址信息。单次查询最大100.
3.查询包含仓库名称地址及物流供货相关信息，单次数量最大20

requestParams.name: type
requestParams.desc: 仓库类型 1:独立仓  2:门店仓

requestParams.name: warehouse_ids
requestParams.desc: 仓库ID列表，传递该参数时，分页参数不生效

children.name: type
children.desc: 仓库类型  1:独立仓  2:门店仓  3:虚拟仓

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['status']=0
params['query_type']=3
params['query_group']="false"
params['page_size']=20
params['page_no']=1
params['retail_source']="test"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.stock.warehouse.search', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'0', 'query_type' => '3', 'query_group' => 'false', 'page_size' => '20', 'page_no' => '1', 'retail_source' => 'test', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';
